Tried to reproduce using the given steps but wasn't able to do so.

Original steps were wrong. I had a VNC client open when this happened. Closing
the VNC client restored normal functioning. I guess the VNC client did soemthing
nasty with the system clipboard.

Have to investigate why ReorgTypedSourcePasteStarter.create(..) is called when
typedSources is null.
Didn't happen again, probably fixed through bug 70077.
Reopening since we got another PR with the same stack trace
